Workload_Description: Data quality validation for Microsoft Fabric using Soda
Workload_Hub_Slogan: Automated Data Quality Checks for Fabric
Workload_Hub_Description:
Define and execute data quality checks against your Fabric Data Warehouses using Soda Core.

Create checks for completeness, accuracy, uniqueness, validity, and freshness. Group checks into test cases and suites. Schedule automated scans and track results over time.

Supports 22+ check templates including row counts, null checks, range validation, foreign key checks, custom SQL, and more.
Workload_Hub_GetStarted_1_Sub_Title: Set up data quality checks in your workspace
Workload_Hub_GetStarted_1_Description: Connect to your data sources, define check templates, create test cases, and run scans to validate data quality.
DQCheckerItem_Description: Data quality validation using Soda Core with 22+ check templates
